ModMetaData.name: Polarisbloc - Storyteller incidents pack
ModMetaData.author: Vaniat
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 3 storytellers and 7 incidents.
Storytells:「Wild AI」Vanya ,「Beserker」No.13 and 「Boffin」Gloria.
Incidents: [Misc]Trade ship crash - A trader ship crashed into your map with all storaged things. [World Quest]Trade ship crash quest - A trader ship chashed nearby your map, you need form a caravan to get the storaged things. [Misc]Demeter's Blessing - Your plant will gain a lot life power, some of them will be harvestable directly. [Threat Small]Turret disturbed - One of your turrents has been disturbed by mechanoids, so it will distinguish you as enemy. [Threat Small]Dekigokoro - One of your colonists will give up job is doing and going to gaze sky. [Threat Small]power conduit fusing - One or more power conduits were overwhelmed and destoryed. [Threat Small]overload - One of your all electric device has taken a lot of current and burn itself out.
Enjoy it! XD
